/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++ -g -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.0.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/VulkanProgram.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o VulkanProgram   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib -lvulkan.1.2.189 -lvulkan.1 glfw3/src/libglfw3.a -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation
